title: Blox Fruits: How to Get and Use Portal Fruit (Guide)

steps.title: Portal Fruit is a Legendary Natural type Fruit.
steps.content: Portal Fruit is a Legendary Natural type Fruit. It is obtained by purchasing it from the Blox Fruit Dealer for $1,900,000 or 2,000 Robux. Portal Fruit is the successor of the Door Fruit. It replaced the Door Fruit in Update 17.3.5. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Portal Fruit has the best overall mobility of all Fruits.
steps.content: Portal Fruit has the best overall mobility of all Fruits. Because Portal Fruit allows you to fast travel, it allows you to be incredibly mobile. That makes it one of the best Fruits for Fruit hunting, avoiding bounty hunters, PvP, and combos. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Portal Dash (Z)
steps.content: Portal Dash ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Damage: 3104 Description: You teleport forward in a flash of blue energy. If you hit an enemy, they will be flung through multiple portals before being smashed onto the ground. This move can break instinct.

steps.title: Parallel Escape (X)
steps.content: Parallel Escape ( X ) Mastery cost: 50 Mastery Damage: 2760 Description: You temporarily enter a parallel dimension where you are invisible and invincible. This dimension lasts for a few seconds. If you use any other skill while in the dimension, you will be thrown out of it. If you use this move next to an enemy, it will stun and damage them, and may break instinct.

steps.title: World Warp (C)
steps.content: World Warp ( C ) Mastery cost: 200 Mastery Damage: n/a Description: You create a portal that allows you to teleport to another place of your choosing. If you have PvP on, other users can use the portal as well. Allies can always use the portal. Neither you nor any other user can travel back through the portal.

steps.title: Dimensional Rift (V)
steps.content: Dimensional Rift ( V ) Mastery cost: 300 Mastery Damage: 7520 Description: You create a rift that pulls yourself and other nearby enemies in range into a separate dimension (and the pull may also break instinct). The only way to escape the dimension is via the portal above you. This dimension slowly drains your energy, and lasts until your energy is depleted, you leave/close the rift, or you die.

steps.title: Quantum Leap (F)
steps.content: Quantum Leap ( F ) Mastery cost: 100 Mastery Damage: 1724 Description: You teleport a short distance by creating a portal at your current location and a portal where your cursor is positioned. If the portal is placed on an enemy or an enemy walks into the portal, they will take damage.

steps.title: Pros
steps.content: Pros Has the best mobility in the game Great for escaping fights A good Fruit choice for Gun or Sword mains Good for finding elusive NPCs like the Legendary Sword Dealer

steps.title: Cons
steps.content: Cons Does relatively low damage Most attacks are close-ranged Enemy players can use your World Warp portal Attacks require precise aiming and timing Not great for Sea Beast hunts due to low damage
